title: It is allowed to use deodorant (powder) while in Ihram?
transcript: I think it it it has to do with a special kind of powder that some people use as deodorants so if it has fragrance if it has smell then it is not permissible to put or apply deodorants uh before after that is but before Iram even if it had scent or fragrance to it you can put perfumes you can put deodorants you can put uh things that have nice smell before uh providing that it is only on your body not on your garments
